data.name: Belly Dance Girl
data.detailed_description:
These girls are really good professional belly dancers. They can dance in a very oily way and blow your mind away...

Game Features:

1 - Nice and oily boobs
2 - Customized characters
3 - Each dancer has her own background music and it will produce music notes from top to bottom, you must press the note buttons below in a very good way to make sure the combo clicks count is not less than 100 and then after the girl has finished dancing you can own one ticket.
4 - Use the tickets to enter Fantasy Space or Dancer Studio to do more amazing things with those cute sweethearts...

Enjoy yourselves!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(i5/i7-series) or AMD (Phenom II series) 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nude and sex contents very frequently, if you are under 18 yrs old please do not download this game.
